resources.string:
The steps I am taking to prepare for a job after graduation: 

 1. Taking any programming classes that I can take for experience. 

 2. Taking an Internship to gain more work experience 

 3. Expanding my knowledge by creating just for fun examples using code. 

 4. Opening up what I am willing to code and what languages.
my graduation plan is to obtain an internship, then a full time job\n as a cyber security specialist.
Davia Balford was born with extra fingers.
